abstract: David Segal The Haggler column successfully intervenes in case of T-Mobile customer whose cellphone was stolen and ended up with bill of $25,571.
snippet: After his cellphone was stolen in South Africa, a T-Mobile customer wound up with a monstrous bill — and asked the Haggler to intervene.
lead_paragraph: After his cellphone was stolen in South Africa, a T-Mobile customer wound up with a monstrous bill — and asked the Haggler to intervene.

headline.main: The Mystery of the $25,000 Phone Bill
headline.seo: A Cellphone Theft, and a $25,000 Phone Bill
headline.print_headline: The Mystery Of the $25,000 Phone Bill
